name: CC MQTT-SN Client Filter
desc:
This filter provides MQTT-SN transport management for the used protocol.

Supports inter-plugin configuration values:
    { "mqttsn.client": "client_id" } - Update configured client id.
    { "mqttsn.username": "username" } - Update configured username.
    { "mqttsn.password": "password" } - Update configured password. Prefix hex bytes with '\x'.
    { "mqttsn.pub_topic": "pub_topic" } - Update default publish topic.
    { "mqttsn.pub_qos": 1 } - Update default publish QoS.
    { "mqttsn.subscribes": [
        {
            "topic": "some/topic", - Subscribe topic.
            "qos": 2, - Subscribe max QoS.
    ] } - Add or update subscribes
    { "mqttsn.subscribes_remove": [
        {
            "topic": "some/topic" - Subscribe topic.
    ] } - Remove subscribes
    { "mqttsn.subscribes_clear": true } - Clear all subscribes.
    { "mqtt.client": "client_id" } - Alias to "mqttsn.client".
    { "mqtt.username": "username" } - Alias to "mqttsn.username".
    { "mqtt.password": "password" } - Alias to "mqttsn.password".
    { "mqtt.pub_topic": "pub_topic" } - Alias to "mqttsn.pub_topic".
    { "mqtt.pub_qos": 1 } - Alias to "mqttsn.pub_qos".
    { "mqtt.subscribes": [...] - Alias to "mqttsn.subscribes". 
    { "mqtt.subscribes_remove": [...] - Alias to "mqttsn.subscribes_remove". 
    { "mqtt.subscribes_clear": true } - Alias to "mqttsn.subscribes_clear". 

Supported message overriding properties:
    { "mqttsn.topic": "some/topic" } - Override publish topic
    { "mqttsn.qos": 1 } - Override publish QoS
    { "mqttsn.retained": true } - Send retained message
    { "mqtt.topic": "some/topic" } - Alias to "mqttsn.topic".
    { "mqtt.qos": 1 } - Alias to "mqttsn.qos".
    { "mqtt.retained": true } - Alias to "mqttsn.retained".
